org.gjt.sp.util
Interface ProgressObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferAutosaveRequest, BufferInsertRequest, BufferIORequest, BufferLoadRequest, BufferSaveRequest, MarkersSaveRequest, WorkRequest
public interface ProgressObserver

Interface used to monitor things that can progress.

jEdit 4.3pre3
